text: Nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl apun, bɨ takaw bɨlokep olap agup, Bɨ nɨm ak kumnɨmuŋ agup ak, bɨ anɨb ak mɨŋel nod dup ak tek chɨl abe dɨnɨgul agɨl gos nɨgɨlok. Pen chɨlop gak anɨb ak, gos awl yɨbɨl owak ak nɨm, chɨl ke kɨles mɨdobul agɨl ma nɨgɨnɨgul. God ne binɨb kubal okok kɨlop gek tɨkjakɨpal anep, kɨles ne ak dɨl chɨlop kod mɨdaknɨŋ mɨdobul agɨl nɨgɨnɨgul.
